NEWSFree Map: Spring-a-Majig
春促每日免费包：春回大地

Download it free from the Minecraft Marketplace!
现可在Minecraft市场免费获取！

Cristina Anderca 克里斯蒂娜·安德卡


Spring is here! And what better way to celebrate than to kick winter’s butt once and for all?
春天来啦！还有什么比狠狠地把冬天踹走来得更好去迎接这春光明媚之时呢？

In this bundle from The Misfit Society and Pathway Studios, you enter a frozen world where winter has overstayed its welcome – and it shows. The crops are dead, the wells are frozen, and even once-gentle animals are turning hostile. But what is there to do? It’s not like you can control the weather…or can you? As the village scientist/wizard and all-around crackpot, you’ve invented the Spring-a-majig, a contraption that brings spring to any area you point it at. Use it to bring nature back to life!
在这张 The Misfit Society 和 Pathway Studios 所呈现的地图里，你来到了一个冬风凛冽的冰雪世界，冬季的严寒在这里永日驻足。庄稼全数冻死，井水也冻结了，甚至是最温顺的动物也要因饥寒而猎捕它们能看到的一切生物。但你又能做些什么呢？你看起来似乎不像是能操纵天气的样子…或者说，你可以吗？ 作为村子内 唯一的科学家/巫师和一位全能的怪人，你发明了 “马吉格之春”，一个能让春天在任意区域复苏的装置。用它来让自然的生机重回大地吧！


Wow, Bambi’s looking rough . 哇，斑比看起来有点凶猛


You can get this bundle (including both an adventure and a survival version of the map) for free as part of our Spring Sale! Head to the Minecraft Marketplace on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Windows 10, iOS, or Android to download it.
现在你可以在 春季促销期间 免费获取该免费内容包 (包括冒险模式与生存模式两张地图) ！现在就打开 Minecraft市场官网 或是 Xbox One，PlayStation 4，Nintendo Switch，Windows 10，iOS 和 Android 的 内购市场 下载吧。
Enjoy!
玩得开心！
